name: My Monster Eats Furniture
summary:
Embark upon an epic and emotional journey with CAT and Dylan about love, dealing with loss and grief. Exciting, hilarious, and fun, yet at times touching and poignant; Dylan learns that inevitably you need to deal with the pain of letting something go.
Collect over 200 pieces of gear and dress up exactly how you want. Feeling like a cheerleader today? A punk rocker? Or maybe just running around town with your cell phone and favorite coffee wearing the D.A.R.E. t-shirt you got at school. It's all possible in My Monster Eats Furniture!
Battle 90 Soul Pops (which can be earned as pets) and 10 powerful bosses across 10 locations in Samuton, the happiest town on earth.
Level up to unlock skills on the skill tree. There are 19 to choose from ranging from passive, active, and buffs.
Create and eat 11 different pieces of furniture to give CAT helpful boosts, take on requests on the job board and so much more!
